meanings.sent1: The bonneted girl looked cute in her hat.
meanings.sent2: She always felt cozy in her bonneted scarf.
meanings.sent3: The bonneted cat strutted around like a fashion model.
meanings.sent4: The bonneted car was the envy of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The bonneted flowers swayed gently in the breeze.

meanings.definition: Covered or adorned with a bonnet.
meanings.sent1: The bonneted car gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The bonneted baby looked adorable in the stroller.
meanings.sent3: The bonneted cake was a sweet surprise at the party.
meanings.sent4: The bonneted tree stood out among the others in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The bonneted doll was a cherished childhood toy.
